content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you dealing with any HVAC, plumbing, or electrical issues?
Hi! I have an issue with my air conditioner. It stopped working yesterday. But before we set anything up, do you all take insurance?

Thank you for reaching out! If I understand correctly, your air conditioner has stopped working. We do work with insurance, but coverage details depend on the specific provider and policy. May I have your name and address to check everything for you and see how we can help?
Thanks for the info. I'm still waiting to hear back from my insurance company about coverage. I don't want to schedule anything until I know for sure they'll cover it.

Of course, I understand completely. Once you have confirmation from your insurance company, feel free to reach out and weâ€™ll be happy to help you get your AC fixed. If you have any other questions in the meantime, just let us know. Wishing you the best with your claim!
reason: Customer is waiting for insurance coverage before scheduling.
